resources.string: Welcome to Water Insights! Together, we can change the world, or something like that (plz fix).

First, you\'ll need to submerge each test strip in the water you\'re testing. Each test strip needs to be treated differently, so we\'ll test one at a time and go through the process together. For the best results, make sure you follow the instructions as closely as possible. The whole process will take about 5 minutes.

For each test strip, after you\'ve submerged it and waited for the correct amount of time, you\'ll need to place the strip on the test card and take a picture. Try to place the test strip as straight as possible on top of the marker on the card.

After you\'ve tested all the strips, we\'ll analyze the pictures and tell you about your water quality. We\'ll also upload the data to a cloud server where we can study trends in water bodies worldwide. Your\'re helping contribute to a World Water Health Map!
Let\'s get some info about the water you\'re testing.
(Your home, the name of a lake, etc.)
Tell us anything else you think would be helpful (optional).
Please select a water body type.
Grab the test strip with 5 colored squares pictures below:
Grab the test strip pictured below and submerge it in the water for about a second. Then place the strip on the test card as level as possible. After 30 seconds, take a picture of the test card.
Make sure the test strip is aligned and is facing the correct direction
Tap anywhere to take the picture
